decks.notes: The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively build a board presence with a variety of Knight creatures. The deck focuses on generating Knight tokens and using effects that benefit from having multiple Knights on the field. The inclusion of cards like The Circle of Loyalty and History of Benalia helps to further increase the number of Knight creatures on the battlefield. The deck also utilizes powerful Knight synergies such as Knight of Grace and Worthy Knight to strengthen its board presence and deal consistent damage to the opponent.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster and Lovestruck Beast while supporting them with ramp creatures like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic. Smuggler's Copter provides card selection and evasion, while Embercleave offers a powerful finisher. The deck also includes removal spells like Wild Slash and Domri's Ambush to control the board. The aim is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient creature-based strategy that can quickly close out games.

The deck focuses on quick and aggressive gameplay, utilizing a combination of creatures and burn spells to deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. Key cards like Smuggler's Copter, Lovestruck Beast, and Legion Warboss provide a strong board presence while cards like Embercleave and Wild Slash offer additional ways to hit the opponent directly. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early on with its efficient creatures and combat tricks, while also maintaining a steady stream of threats to keep the pressure on throughout the game.

The focus of this deck is to assemble Lotus Field with other key combo pieces quickly in order to generate a large amount of mana and cast powerful spells like Omniscience or Dig Through Time. The deck utilizes cards like Once Upon a Time, Growth Spiral, and Sylvan Scrying to find Lotus Field efficiently, while also including cards like Hidden Strings and Vizier of Tumbling Sands to untap Lotus Field for additional mana generation. Fae of Wishes is included to access sideboard cards needed to win specific matchups.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on quickly establishing a board presence and pressuring the opponent with efficient creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing cards like Lovestruck Beast, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Bonecrusher Giant, the deck aims to deal damage quickly while also maintaining board control. The inclusion of cards like Smuggler's Copter and Embercleave adds additional reach and power to the deck, allowing for explosive turns that can close out games swiftly. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggression and efficient threats.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game through ramping and board control. It utilizes green ramp cards like Growth Spiral and Elvish Rejuvenator to quickly generate mana and accelerate the deck. The deck also includes control elements such as Supreme Verdict and Detention Sphere to clear the opponent's board and maintain control. The win condition of the deck is focused on Field of the Dead, which generates zombie tokens as the game progresses. Teferi, Time Raveler provides additional control and disruption, while Sphinx's Revelation and Hydroid Krasis give the deck additional card draw and lifegain.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize Lotus Field as a key piece to ramp up mana quickly, allowing for explosive plays with cards like Omniscience and Fae of Wishes. The deck also includes various ways to dig through the deck and find key pieces with cards like Dig Through Time and Once Upon a Time. Hidden Strings and Vizier of Tumbling Sands can provide additional mana or untap Lotus Field for even more mana generation. Overall, the deck aims to set up a powerful combo quickly and overwhelm the opponent with big plays.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and planeswalkers in the early game to put pressure on the opponent. With a mix of powerful creatures like Steel Leaf Champion and Questing Beast, along with versatile planeswalkers like Oko, Thief of Crowns, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and finish the game before they can stabilize. By utilizing efficient mana dorks and stubborn denial for disruption, the deck aims to maintain board presence and control the game tempo throughout the match.

The central focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent through aggressive creature plays and combat tricks. By utilizing mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves to ramp into powerful threats like Bonecrusher Giant and Questing Beast, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and combat tricks like Embercleave and Domri's Ambush. Smuggler's Copter provides additional card filtering and evasion, while cards like Vine Mare provide difficult-to-remove threats. The key strategy is to maintain pressure and tempo to secure a victory.

The key concept of this Simic Aggro deck is to utilize powerful creatures and planeswalkers to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. By ramping up with mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Gilded Goose, the deck can play out threats like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis ahead of schedule. Cards like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Wicked Wolf provide disruptive elements while also boosting the aggressive game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and versatile answers while utilizing its mana efficiently with cards like Once Upon a Time and Mutavault.

The main idea of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. By utilizing cards like Bloodsoaked Champion, Knight of the Ebon Legion, and Spawn of Mayhem, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on and maintain a steady stream of threats throughout the game. Thoughtseize provides disruption against the opponent's game plan, while Fatal Push and Murderous Rider help to remove any blockers in the way. The deck also includes vehicles like Aethersphere Harvester and Smuggler's Copter for additional evasion and card advantage. The combination of these cards allows the deck to quickly close out games through a mix of early aggression and powerful finishers.

The main concept of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to establish early board presence with low-cost creatures like Cloudfin Raptor and Siren Stormtamer, and then power up with powerful finishers like Master of Waves and Tempest Djinn. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Merfolk Trickster and Harbinger of the Tides to control the opponent's board. Gadwick, the Wizened and Thassa, God of the Sea provide additional card draw and utility. The deck aims to pressure the opponent quickly and efficiently while maintaining card advantage and tempo.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana with cards like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx, while utilizing aggressive creatures like Wicked Wolf and Hydroid Krasis to apply constant pressure on the opponent. Cards like Once Upon a Time and Oko, Thief of Crowns provide additional versatility and disruption to control the game tempo. The deck aims to establish board presence early and overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and powerful mana generation.

The main strategy of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and efficient mana ramp. This is achieved by playing cards like Oko, Thief of Crowns and Lovestruck Beast early on to establish board presence, followed by aggressive creatures like Questing Beast and Steel Leaf Champion to deal damage quickly. The deck also includes cards like Stubborn Denial and Wicked Wolf for removal and disruption. The inclusion of Aethersphere Harvester and Heart of Kiran provides additional ways to pressure the opponent and ensures adaptability in different game situations.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with efficient and aggressive creatures. By using powerful creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Lovestruck Beast, and Questing Beast, along with mana accelerators like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves, the goal is to establish a threatening board early on and apply constant pressure. Gruul Aggro also utilizes combat tricks and equipment like Embercleave to push through damage and close out games swiftly. The deck's speed and consistency make it a formidable opponent in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

The deck focuses on using mana ramp through green spells and creatures to quickly cast powerful colorless Eldrazi like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. It also includes control elements like Oblivion Sower and World Breaker to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with threats while generating advantage through lands like Field of the Dead and Castle Garenbrig. It is designed to control the board and win through powerful creatures and incremental advantage.

The main focus of this Gruul Aggro deck is to establish early board presence with efficient creatures like Bonecrusher Giant, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Questing Beast. These creatures are supported by mana dorks like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves to ramp into powerful threats like Glorybringer and Rekindling Phoenix. The deck also includes removal spells like Abrade and creatures with evasion like Smuggler's Copter to keep the pressure on the opponent. The goal is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and finish them off with cards like Embercleave.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through utilizing green ramp spells to quickly access mana resources and play powerful cards. This allows the player to establish a board presence with lands like Field of the Dead and generate multiple zombie tokens to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes control spells like Supreme Verdict and Teferi, Time Raveler to manage the opponent's threats and disrupt their game plan. By combining ramp and control elements, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in the long game.

The deck focuses on low-cost, aggressive creatures with evasion abilities like flying or deathtouch, backed up by disruption in the form of hand disruption and removal spells. It aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures while also disrupting their game plan. The deck also includes cards like Aethersphere Harvester and Smuggler's Copter to provide additional reach and card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent and win the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and planeswalkers. The deck utilizes mana acceleration with cards like Llanowar Elves and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx to ramp into powerful threats like Nissa, Who Shakes the World and Hydroid Krasis. Oko, Thief of Crowns provides disruption and versatility, while Wicked Wolf and Voracious Hydra offer additional aggressive options. The aim is to pressure the opponent early and maintain a steady stream of threats to control the game and secure a victory.
